articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.title: Apple Allows Sideloading Apps On iPhone In Some Countries, Excluding India - Zee News
articles.description: The tech giant Apple is making updates to the iPhone and iPad software with the upcoming iOS 17.4, along with several changes to the App Store, including sideloading apps on the iPhone. Apple is implementing these changes to comply with the European Union’s D…
